text.tspan: Changes in unemployment and wellbeing during the financial crisis:
Unit 13 'Economic fluctuations and unemployment’ in The CORE Team, The Economy. Available at:
Source: Algan, Beasley, Guyot and Murtin (2014)
Note: Changes are simple differences between year 2010 and 2007. CC-BY-ND-NC
